Row.Text: 当你触发尤里卡或鼓舞的时候，你正在建造的建筑、区域、单位和项目当前的进度立刻分别增加25%和50%。[NEWLINE]当你同时拥有[ICON_RESOURCE_TEA]茶叶、[ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY]水银、[ICON_RESOURCE_SILK]丝绸、[ICON_RESOURCE_JADE]玉石的时候，你的宗教传播距离和强度会提高200%，研究无线电之后强度再提高200%。[NEWLINE]盟友和始皇帝之间的商路会额外为双方提供16点[ICON_SCIENCE]和[ICON_CULTURE]。[NEWLINE]拥有总督的城市[ICON_Citizen]产出+3[ICON_Gold]并且收获地区时+100%收成，训练的单位提高2点[ICON_Movement]并且可以购买区域。

拥有中国文明及所有中国领袖的全部强化版能力。（以官方内容为准并根据资料片而变化）。[NEWLINE]当你的城市拥有太空站的时候，提高25%[ICON_SCIENCE]产出，没有太空站则提高25%[ICON_CULTURE]产出。[NEWLINE]当你的城市拥有机场的时候，你的边界扩张效率提高100%，没有机场则人口增长提高100%。[NEWLINE]黄金时代时，天基长城和宇宙中心拥有文化炸弹功能并且[ICON_TourismLarge]旅游业绩提高200%，你的[ICON_Envoy]每回合+6点；黑暗时代时，通过[ICON_GOLD]和[ICON_FAITH]购买折扣50%，单位经验提高200%，建造单位时[ICON_PRODUCTION]提高100%。

當你觸發尤里卡或鼓舞的時候，你正在建造的建築、區域、單位和項目當前的進度立刻分別增加25%和50%。 [NEWLINE]當你同時擁有[ICON_RESOURCE_TEA]茶葉、[ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY]水銀、[ICON_RESOURCE_SILK]絲綢、[ICON_RESOURCE_JADE]玉石的時候，你的宗教傳播距離和強度會提高200%，研究無線電之後強度再提高200%。 [NEWLINE]盟友和始皇帝之間的商路會額外為雙方提供16點[ICON_SCIENCE]和[ICON_CULTURE]。 [NEWLINE]擁有總督的城市[ICON_Citizen]產出+3[ICON_Gold]並且收穫地區時+100%收成，訓練的單位提高2點[ICON_Movement]並且可以購買區域。

擁有中國文明及所有中國領袖的全部強化版能力。 （以官方內容為準並根據資料片而變化）。 [NEWLINE]當你的城市擁有太空站的時候，提高25%[ICON_SCIENCE]產出，沒有太空站則提高25%[ICON_CULTURE]產出。 [NEWLINE]當你的城市擁有機場的時候，你的邊界擴張效率提高100%，沒有機場則人口增長提高100%。 [NEWLINE]黃金時代時，天基長城和宇宙中心擁有文化炸彈功能並且[ICON_TourismLarge]旅遊業績提高200%，你的[ICON_Envoy]每回合+6點；黑暗時代時，通過[ICON_GOLD]和[ICON_FAITH]購買折扣50%，單位經驗提高200%，建造單位時[ICON_PRODUCTION]提高100%。

When you trigger Eureka or inspire, the current progress of the buildings, areas, units, and projects you are building is immediately increased by 25% and 50%, respectively. [NEWLINE]When you have both [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] tea, [ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY] mercury, [ICON_RESOURCE_SILK] silk, [ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] jade, your religious distance and intensity will increase by 200%, and the intensity of the radio will increase by 200%. [NEWLINE]The trade route between the ally and the first emperor will provide 16 points [ICON_SCIENCE] and [ICON_CULTURE] for both parties. [NEWLINE]The city with the Governor's [ICON_Citizen] output +3[ICON_Gold] and the harvested area +100% harvest, the training unit increased by 2 points [ICON_Movement] and the area can be purchased.
From ancient times to the present

It has all the enhanced capabilities of Chinese civilization and all Chinese leaders. (Subject to official content and vary according to the expansion). [NEWLINE]When your city has a space station, it increases the output by 25% [ICON_SCIENCE], and without the space station it increases the output by 25% [ICON_CULTURE]. [NEWLINE]When you have a city with an airport, your border expansion efficiency is increased by 100%, and without an airport, population growth is increased by 100%. [NEWLINE]When the Golden Age, the Space-based Great Wall and the Center of the Universe have a cultural bomb function and [ICON_TourismLarge] travel performance increased by 200%, your [ICON_Envoy] +6 points per turn; in the dark age, through [ICON_GOLD] and [ICON_FAITH] Purchase discounts of 50%, unit experience increased by 200%, and [ICON_PRODUCTION] increased by 100% when building units.
